ARABIC: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيْمَٰنَ نِعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We gave Dawud Sulayman. What an excellent slave! He truly turned to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We bestowed Solomon on David who was an excellent devotee, for he turned to God in penitence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We bestowed upon David (an illustrious son), Solomon. How excellent a servant (of Ours he was)! Indeed he constantly turned to Us in devotion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We granted Solomon to David, a blessed servant of Ours and certainly the most repentant person.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We bestowed Sulaiman to Dawud; what an excellent bondman! He is indeed most inclined.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And to Dawud We gave Sulayman. How excellent a servant! Verily, he was ever turning in repentance (to Us)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We gave to Dawood Sulaiman, most excellent the servant! Surely he was frequent in returning (to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We gave unto David Solomon; how excellent a servant he was! He was a penitent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We bestowed on David, Solomon. How excellent a slave! Lo! he was ever turning in repentance (toward Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We gave David Solomon. He was an excellent servant who always turned to God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We vouchsafed Unto Da-ud Sulaiman. How excellent a bondman! j Verily he was oft-returning.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And to David We gave Solomon—what an excellent servant he was! Indeed, he was a penitent [soul].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To David We gave Solomon (for a son),- How excellent in Our service! Ever did he turn (to Us)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And to Dawud (David) We gave Sulaiman (Solomon). How excellent (a) slave! Verily, he was ever oft-returning in repentance (to Us)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We gave Solomon to David; and he was an excellent worshiper, he was penitent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We granted David, Solomon, an excellent servant. He was penitent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And to David We gave Solomon. An excellent servant, indeed he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:30] And We bestowed on David, Solomon, his son — what an excellent servant!, that is, Solomon. Truly he was a penitent [soul], always returning [to God] with glorification and remembrance at all times.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We bestowed on David, Solomon. How excellent a slave! Lo! he was ever turning in repentance (towards Allah)) he is ever betaking himself to Allah and engaged in His obedience.
